meanings.sent1: Before the big event, they were preuniting to ensure everything went smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She always enjoys preuniting the ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent3: The animals were preuniting in the forest for their annual meeting.
meanings.sent4: The team was preuniting their strategies for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent5: Preuniting the pieces of the puzzle made it easier to solve.

meanings.definition: The act of uniting before something else.
meanings.sent1: The preuniting of the two groups helped avoid conflicts later on.
meanings.sent2: She studied the preuniting of the tribes in ancient history.
meanings.sent3: The preuniting of the colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent4: The preuniting of the elements formed a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The preuniting of the teams led to a successful collaboration.
